messages.subject: Orange County Unschoolers--- OT
messages.msgSnippet: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/Learningfromlife/ I dont know if there is anyone in Southern California on this list and more specifically Orange County. I have
messages.messageBody:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/Learningfromlife/

I dont know if there is anyone in Southern California on this list and more specifically Orange County. I have just set up this list to visit with those folks in my area. I dont know anyone in real life who unschools and I would like to. So please come and join the fun if you are from the area.
God bless
Vivian
Mom to three Happy little Monkeys
Austin 10/31/93 Sarah 8/28/95 Emmalee 8/15/00
And loving wife to Randy

**If fifty million people say a foolish thing, it is still a foolish thing.
-Anatole France***




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
